_header: Greater matter of dole and heaviness
Title(s): A Complaint for lack of mercy
_description: John Lydgate, A Complaint for lack of mercy — four 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

CULFf16.First Lines:
Grettere mater of dol an heuynesseNor more cause haith no man to
                    complayneThan y alas with langwysche yn sekenesseAnd at myn herte
                    abyde the dedely payne…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…I nere but ded pleynely þis is no fableWith oute recure
                    for lacke of mercy
